text: Ezɨ gumazir maba bizir kabagh fozir puvatɨ. Marazi fomɨra marvir guabar arazibar gɨn ghue, kamaghɨn amigha, datɨrɨghɨn asɨzir me apir kaba, me ghaze, kar marvir guabar guizɨn ofa. Men nɨghnɨziba kuiaghrezir puvatɨgha egha gavgavizir puvatɨ, ezɨ me asɨzir kaba apava ghaze, me derazir puvatɨzir arazim gami.
